properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Watch issued February 7 at 3:07AM PST until February 9 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very steep and hazardous seas 11 to 16 ft at 13 seconds
possible.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...From late tonight through Sunday morning.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Bar crossing could become especially hazardous.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Consider altering your plans to avoid possible hazardous and very
steep sea conditions.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS SEAS WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
